title: fix: point highlights URLs to news branch
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Extra! Extra! Read all about it!
gist.blurb: Our news highlights were playing hide and seek on the wrong branch. We found them and brought them back to the homepage.
gist.summary: Updated frontend configurations to fetch news highlights from the correct `news` branch instead of `main`.
gist.impact: The news banners and highlight sections on both frontends will now correctly load content instead of returning 404 errors.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot reconnecting a wire to a digital newspaper stand or news feed terminal.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot fixing a tiny pixelated newspaper stand. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. The bee is connecting a glowing wire to a digital news feed. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'NEWS FEED'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
